8.title: Prêt-à-porter
8.plot: Mateo is set to leave Spain to NY in search of Alberto. Patricia is caught having an affair which was then punishable with jail time. The police come looking for her. In Ana's absence (she's in Italy receiving an award) the Italian tries to take credit for her new line but is beat to the punch by Don Emilio. Clara and Mateo reunite kinda sorta. Hurry and finish, this ghost of Alberto is really getting old. Oh, and Christina makes wedding preparations for Carlos and Ana. They're set to marry next episode.

10.title: Y entonces... llegó él
10.plot: A summary of all the romance story between Alberto and Ana. From the beginning of their relationship when they were kids. The story telling takes us directly to the moment were Ana's friends stop the wedding and Alberto arrives with Mateo from New York.

11.title: El gran día II
11.plot: Mateo makes a big confession to Clara, Raúl finally finds a romance if his own, Rita has a scare, and Anna and Alberto get their happy ending at last.

1.title: Alas de mariposa
1.plot: Alberto's father commits suicide at a fashion event at his store called Velvet, while his son leaves and is driving away with Ana. Over the radio it's accounted about the suicide and Alberto gets into an accident and ends up not leaving and assuming responsibility of his father's legacy. Alberto's step mom hides a note left behind by his father addressed to him.

2.title: Y llegó ella
2.plot: While Ana struggles to recover, Alberto confronts his family, who has learned his romance with the seamstress. But it must also deal with the consequences of the death of his father: an inheritance to divide and multiple secrets Don Rafael kept, among which is the ruin of the company. Alberto decides to request marriage to Ana. Will she accept the proposition of the young Velvet owner?

3.title: Nada es tan sencillo
3.plot: Once Ana has gone, Alberto has agreed to marry Cristina, Gerardo's daughter, though his intention is override as business improves. Meanwhile, in the galleries, Max, the new clerk, brings certain memories of a past that Doña Blanca concealed until now. A pendant using Max is the key to recognize him as the son she had and left in a hospice. Max does not deny even he recognizes it.

4.title: El diseñador
4.plot: Gloria is convinced that Alberto and Ana are together but have to prove it in some way or other. So she asked his daughter Patricia helps her to sink the plans Alberto in order to take the control of the galleries. This will not be the main concern of Alberto who must now convince the famous designer Raúl de la Riva, so that with his original designs, helps to revive the business.

5.title: Entre dos mujeres
5.plot: Ana and Cristina are seeking for the perfect birthday gift for Alberto. Ana, strives to get a special gift for both in his first birthday up without his father. While Cristina, who can access almost anything, also try to surprise her fiancé. Luck does not favor Rita within love. She can not keep watching as the ratio of Clara and Pedro seems increasingly consolidated. Rita falls apart and realizes: you have to move on. Meanwhile, Luisa continues under pressure from Don Francisco. This time, the client goes a step further and asks her to spend a night together. Will ...

6.title: París
6.plot: Alberto and Ana can feel free in Paris, the place with which both have dreamed - until Cristina arrives as a big surprise to Alberto. Dinner plans for Ana and Alberto are vanished and Ana suffers a huge disappointment when she hears and sees Alberto leading Cristina to his room, with a few drinks, and assumed what did not exist. Once Cristina has fallen asleep, Alberto leaves his room and knocks on the door of Ana's room but no response is received. Ana is devastated by her unfaithful lover.

7.title: El día después
7.plot: Ana returns to the galleries completely disappointed. Paris has left the certainty that something happened between Alberto and Cristina, but he assures her that's not true. Someone blackmails Alberto with photographs showing him with Ana in an ashamed situation, threatening to bring the photos out if he does not pay. After discovering the truth of Max, Doña Rita gets sick and Blanca has to take over the sewing workshop. Patricia's mother, Alberto's stepmother as well, is behind the blackmail but she has to pay before she knows Don Emilio is already aware of Alberto's ...

8.title: La decisión de Alberto
8.plot: After seeing Ana with another man, Alberto is increasingly away from her and with the wedding approaching, feels he has to choose: either Anna or Cristina. Tired of so many doubts, makes a decision that could change everything forever. Meanwhile, Peter is responsible for his son Manolito who has to hide so the child can stay with him. This will have with the help of Rita. Moreover, Luisa wakes alerted by the absence of her husband.

9.title: El gran día
9.plot: Bitter after Hannah has jilted at the altar, Alberto refuses to talk to the dressmaker. Maybe it's time to go for Cristina. If Ana wants to get Alberto, now have to be she who fights for him. Meanwhile, in the galleries, the big day arrives everyone expected: Parade Raúl de la Riva. But a setback last minute can put the whole parade not only endanger the future of the galleries but Alberto plans. One of the dummies has not been submitted and is a free pattern. The dress measurements fit Clara who becomes queen pageant, amaze everyone, mainly Mateo.

10.title: Los restos del naufragio
10.plot: Ana is willing to do anything to regain the confidence of Alberto, but discovers a truth that can zoom out forever the love of his life. Alberto is focused on the exit to the sale of Raúl de la Riva, d collection, they have a most unexpected result. Both the decision of the father of Cristina: It has been discovered that Alberto is cheating with another and willing to cancel the wedding. Meanwhile, Clara receives a gift from a filmmaker after his success in the parade and the secretary no doubt take the opportunity that presents itself.

1.title: El hombre del año
1.plot: Alberto and Ana finally gave vent to his love. Now that Cristina is gone, they are determined to bet stronger than ever by their relationship. Everything goes smoothly and even Alberto will give an award from the Association of Employers 'Man of the Year'. However, in delivering that award, an unexpected surprise can change everything. Esteban, Alberto's uncle, is flirting with Doña Blanca and take advantage of this relationship to steal some De la Riva's designs.

2.title: Ser o no ser
2.plot: After learning that Cristina is pregnant, Alberto and Ana have much to think about. Both had proposed fight all odds for their relationship, but this news can change everything, but surprisingly Alberto is very clear. Anna will not give up. Meanwhile, Cristina is willing to do anything to recover Alberto and with the help of Barbara plots a plan to take her to be closer to her husband. Meanwhile, Rita and Pedro enjoyed as ever. They finally have their wedding night and happiness fills them, at least until they discover next to Jonás a terrible event can lead to the ...

3.title: Que cumplas muchos más

imdb.plot outline: Alberto (Miguel Ángel Silvestre) has been left to run a store called Velvet, one of the most prestigious fashion stores in Spain, by his late father. Velvet is a Spanish television series (English subtitles available on Netflix). It takes place in the 50's / 60's and displays the beautiful clothing and cars from that era. The main storyline of the show is the business decisions surrounding the continuation of the fashion store and the steamy love story of Alberto, heir of Galerías Velvet, and Ana (Paula Echevarría), who works as a seamstress there.
imdb.title: Velvet

other companies.name: Gate Media Funding and Financial Services,SL

plot: A feel-good, compelling Spanish story of a fashion house in Madrid in the late 50's, which is scene to money, fashion, drama, entanglements, love, jealousies, plots, counter-plots involving its owners, customers and residential employees.::SHS(fnpshs@gmail.com)

Alberto (Miguel Ángel Silvestre) has been left to run a store called _Velvet_ (qv), one of the most prestigious fashion stores in Spain, by his late father. _Velvet_ (qv) is a Spanish television series (English subtitles available on Netflix). It takes place in the 50's / 60's and displays the beautiful clothing and cars from that era. The main storyline of the show is the business decisions surrounding the continuation of the fashion store and the steamy love story of Alberto, heir of Galerías _Velvet_ (qv), and Ana (Paula Echevarría), who works as a seamstress there.::cindyontario
